WO-IMPL-CONNECTIVITY-ENFORCEMENT.title: Connectivity & SSoT Enforcement
WO-IMPL-CONNECTIVITY-ENFORCEMENT.instruction_raw: Implement the Connectivity & SSoT enforcement spec to resolve critical technical debts (SSoT Bypass and Transfer Handler Gap).

WO-IMPL-INFRA-RELIABILITY.title: Infrastructure & Persistence Reliability
WO-IMPL-INFRA-RELIABILITY.instruction_raw: Implement the Infrastructure & Persistence reliability spec to resolve high-priority technical debts (Checkpointing and Lifecycle Suture).
